com.inrix.sdk

Class IncidentsManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.inrix.sdk.IncidentsManager

  • public class IncidentsManager
extends Object
    Manages asynchronous operations that involve incidents that can affect traffic.

    • Nested Class Summary

      Nested Classes 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      static interface  IncidentsManager.IIncidentDeleteListener
      The listener for deleting incidents.
      static interface  IncidentsManager.IIncidentReportListener
      The listener for reporting incidents.
      static interface  IncidentsManager.IIncidentReviewListener
      The listener for reviewing incidents.
      static interface  IncidentsManager.IIncidentsResponseListener
      The listener for retrieving incidents.
      static class  IncidentsManager.IncidentBoxOptions
      Contains options that specify which incidents in a box to return.
      static class  IncidentsManager.IncidentDeleteOptions
      Contains options for deleting incidents, which allows you to cancel an incident that was previously reported.
      static interface  IncidentsManager.IncidentOutputFields
      Incident output field types.
      static class  IncidentsManager.IncidentRadiusOptions
      Contains options that specify which incidents in a box to return.
      static class  IncidentsManager.IncidentReportOptions
      Contains information on reporting an incident.
      static class  IncidentsManager.IncidentReviewOptions
      Contains options for reviewing incidents, allowing confirmation that an incident is valid.
      static class  IncidentsManager.IncidentsManagerException
      An exception that is thrown when there is an error with an IncidentsManager operation.
      static interface  IncidentsManager.IXDIncidentResponseListener
      The listener for Getting XDIncidents.
      static class  IncidentsManager.RoadSide
      The side of the road where the incident occurred.
      static class  IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInBox
      XDIncidentOptions in a particular search radius defined by [center,searchRadius].
      static class  IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInRadius
      XDIncidentOptionsInRadius in a particular search radius defined by [center,searchRadius].

      Return hazard incidents that could alter traffic speed.

      • INCIDENT_OUTPUT_FIELD_TYPE

        public static final int INCIDENT_OUTPUT_FIELD_TYPE
        The type of the incident. Incidents can be determined from the Alert-C event code, Construction indicates the presence of road construction, Events can be weather-related or a scheduled sporting/public event, and Flow indicates a blocking incident.

        See:

        • IncidentsManager.INCIDENT_TYPE_CONSTRUCTION
        • IncidentsManager.INCIDENT_TYPE_EVENT
        • IncidentsManager.INCIDENT_TYPE_CONGESTION
        • IncidentsManager.INCIDENT_TYPE_ACCIDENT
        • IncidentsManager.INCIDENT_TYPE_POLICE
        • IncidentsManager.INCIDENT_TYPE_ROAD_CLOSURE
        • IncidentsManager.INCIDENT_TYPE_HAZARD
        See Also:
        Constant Field Values

    • Method Detail

      • showIncidents

        public final boolean showIncidents(float zoom)
        Gets the value indicating whether to show incidents on the specified zoom level.
        Parameters:
        zoom - Target zoom level.
        Returns:
        A value indicating whether to show incidents on the specified zoom level.

      • getConfiguration

        public IncidentsConfig getConfiguration()
        Gets the configuration for IncidentsConfig.
        Returns:
        An instance of IncidentsConfig.

      • getIncidentsInBox

        public ICancellable getIncidentsInBox(IncidentsManager.IncidentBoxOptions options,
                             IncidentsManager.IIncidentsResponseListener listener)
        Get incidents in the specified rectangular region.

        Note: If too much data is returned (for example, for very large regions), an OutOfMemoryException may be thrown.

        Parameters:
        options - Options for which incidents to return.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        IncidentsManager.IncidentsManagerException - when
        • options is null or contains invalid parameters
        • listener is null

      • getIncidentsInRadius

        public ICancellable getIncidentsInRadius(IncidentsManager.IncidentRadiusOptions options,
                                IncidentsManager.IIncidentsResponseListener listener)
        Get incidents in the specified circular region.

        Note: If too much data is returned (for example, for very large regions), an OutOfMemoryException may be thrown.

        Parameters:
        options - Options for which incidents to return.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        IncidentsManager.IncidentsManagerException - when
        • options is null or contains invalid parameters
        • listener is null

      • reportIncident

        public ICancellable reportIncident(IncidentsManager.IncidentReportOptions options,
                          IncidentsManager.IIncidentReportListener listener)
        Reports a incident. Can be used to report a new incident or update an existing one. To update an existing one, specify the incident ID and include any updated information.
        Parameters:
        options - Incident report options. See IncidentsManager.IncidentReportOptions for more information. Use IncidentsManager.IncidentReportOptions.getReportAccidentOptions() , IncidentsManager.IncidentReportOptions.getReportConstructionOptions() , IncidentsManager.IncidentReportOptions.getReportHazardOptions() , and IncidentsManager.IncidentReportOptions.getReportPoliceOptions() to report corresponding events.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        IncidentsManager.IncidentsManagerException - when
        • options is null or contains invalid parameters
        • listener is null

      • reviewIncident

        public ICancellable reviewIncident(IncidentsManager.IncidentReviewOptions options,
                          IncidentsManager.IIncidentReviewListener listener)
        Vote on whether specified incident is valid.
        Parameters:
        options - Incident review options.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        IncidentsManager.IncidentsManagerException - when
        • options is null or contains invalid parameters
        • listener is null

      • deleteIncident

        public ICancellable deleteIncident(IncidentsManager.IncidentDeleteOptions options,
                          IncidentsManager.IIncidentDeleteListener listener)
        Cancels a previously reported incident.
        Parameters:
        options - Information on what incident to delete.
        listener - The listener that will receive the response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        IncidentsManager.IncidentsManagerException - when
        • options is null or contains invalid parameters
        • listener is null

      • getXDIncidentsInRadius

        public ICancellable getXDIncidentsInRadius(IncidentsManager.XDIncidentOptionsInRadius options,
                                  IncidentsManager.IXDIncidentResponseListener listener)
        Gets XDIncident in a specified radius see XDIncident.
        Parameters:
        options - selection criteria for XDIncidents.
        listener - The listener that will receive the XDIncident response.
        Returns:
        An instance of ICancellable so that the request can be cancelled.
        Throws:
        IncidentsManager.IncidentsManagerException - when
        • options is null or contains invalid parameters
        • listener is null
